Name: Spirit and Katana
About the game: A heroic adventure in the land of Celedain Embark on a new journey to Celedain where you join a guild, build friendships, and have good times with the people you care about. Stunning visuals and a wonderful art style The cities, the landscapes, the characters... all of it looks so wonderful once you see it on your screen. Uplifting music and songs for you to enjoy The graceful music and uplifting songs will bring you a relaxing ambience as you play the game. Sing along with the songs and replay the videos as much as you like! Many Gallery Pictures To Collect Collect biographies, pictures, and scenes with all of your favorite characters! Learn more about the characters and enjoy the memories you shared in the story! Save often so you can return to your favorite chapters There are over 100 Save Slots for you to use. It's a good idea to save at the beginning of each chapter and song. That way, you can always come back to your favorite scenes and songs! Steam Achievements for you to collect Play through the game and get Steam Achievements! There's 10 to collect in all! Additional Notes This game is family friendly and has no adult content. This game is meant to be played as if you were watching an anime or reading a manga. As the writers of the story, we wish to bring these heart-warming memories to you so that you can enjoy them as well. This game will give you the most impact if you read it from start to finish. Thank you!
